```{r}
Public_UC_Criminal_Offenses_Campus_short <- Public_UC_Criminal_Offenses_Campus %>% filter(Survey.year, Institution.name, Unitid, Campus.Name, Institution.Size, Sex.offenses...Forcible, Robbery, Aggravated.assault, Burglary, Motor.vehicle.theft, Arson) %>% unite(Sex.offenses...Forcible, Robbery, Aggravated.assault, Burglary, Motor.vehicle.theft, Arson, sep="", remove=FALSE)

str(Public_UC_Criminal_Offenses_Campus_short)
ggplot(Public_UC_Criminal_Offenses_Campus_short, aes(x,y))
ggplot(Public_UC_Criminal_Offenses_Campus_short, aes(x = Survey.year, y = Unitid, group = Unitid)) + geom_line(aes(color = Crime))
```
